author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DISTURBANCE MEANDERING IN THE SOUTH CENTRAL CARIBBEAN...
summary:
...DISTURBANCE MEANDERING IN THE SOUTH CENTRAL CARIBBEAN...
 As of 7:00 PM EST Sun Nov 3
 the center of Eighteen was located near 13.0, -76.9
 with movement N at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Potential Tropical Cyclone Eighteen (AT3/AL182024)
